website_summaries.verdict: This 2-sided CPAP pillow has both memory foam and fiberfill sides, providing comfort and durability that will retain its shape for years to come.
pros: Includes hose tether to improve movement of equipment throughout sleep cycle
Cutouts on sides reduce the need to re-adjust the mask after its in place
Pillow design works for stomach, side, and back sleepers
Can adjust the layers to create the perfect amount of thickness
cons: There are users who wish the pillow could elevate a bit higher, and that it were larger in size

customer_reviews.title: If you are struggling with your CPAP mask, read this review.
customer_reviews.text: I am a new CPAP user and quickly realized the necessity of having a pillow that works with you to achieve the best experience with your mask. I am one picky guy and this pillow is a home run! I used all three layers on the first night and it was perfect for me. On my back it cradled my neck and head perfectly. The real surprise came when sleeping on my side. This pillow supports both your chin and forehead yet puts no pressure on the mask...exactly what is needed. While the details are not important for this review, my mask fit and AHI number were surprisingly good...it works!
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: I am a side cpap/full mask sleeper and have been sleeping with my chin tucked down since starting cpap. This resulted in a lot of upper neck pain/tightness and occipital headaches / neuralgia. I bought this pillow and noticed a positive change right away as it allowed me to sleep with my neck in a neutral position. Woohoo! Can't believe I waited this long. My criticisms of the product are that the memory foam layer sleeps very warm and gets hard after a few minutes. I found it very uncomfortable. My solution was to remove the top and bottom layer and replace each layer with 1" latex foam and the pillow is just about perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Way too hard
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it would be comfortable when you squeeze it with your hand, but once you lay on it, it gets hard with the constant pressure of your head. It was also too long for my neck and my cpap mask didn't reach the cutouts. I removed and replaced layers, I cut it to try to make it fit properly for me, but at the end of the day it was just too hard. When I told the lady at my cpap supply company that I had that pillow, which they sell, she said she didn't recommend it because it was hard.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Customizable pillow with great design
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used several crazy CPAP pillows over the years, never more than 2 weeks due to extreme discomfort, until this one. Their design is great. By allowing you to customize the height of the pillow by removing layers of cushion. You can get the exact night you like and the right mix of support. The cut outs are also perfectly sized for my average size head. You can use it in several different orientations to find your comfort zone. Love it. First new pillow I’ve used and liked in a long time. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Feet

customer_reviews.title: Finally a pillow that also helps with the pinched nerve ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pillow that also helps with the pinched nerve in my neck! It is low enough to keep my arms from going numb and high enough to keep my airway open along with my bed at zero gravity position.
customer_reviews.author: Buku Raider

customer_reviews.title: It's like sleeping before the CPAP
customer_reviews.text: You're going to look at this pillow and think, how is this going to help me sleep?! I slept so well because the mask wasn't pushing on my face. My neck has been bothering me and when I put my head on the pillow I immediately started to feel my neck readjust and this morning it feels so much better. The attachment for the hose looks so stupid, but when you attach it and find yourself not having to deal with the hose in the middle of the night it's such a god send.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: The 2nd Contour pillow I bought was not the same as the first one
customer_reviews.text: 4 weeks ago i bought on Amazon online, a Contour Cpap pillow. It was great. I wanted a 2nd one just like it. Ordered it on line from Amazon and it is not the same as the first one. Same brand but way too soft and not of any value. I am returning the soft one. but concerned about trying to buy another for fear it will be just as bad as the 2nd one I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I moved and removed the inserts, turned it over for a different feel and could not sleep with this pillow. I could not find a "dent" for my mask and had the worst face marks in the morning I've ever had. It is so small as to be useless. It might work for you but I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I could not use the pillow. I thought for sure it would be right for me but it is in the closet. I am a side sleeper and I thought this pillow with the cut out would be great but not a chance, made things worse. It causes my mask to leak and then that causes noise which wakes my partner and me. I tried for 10 night but just could not do it any longer. Sorry I have such a bad review but I gave it a good try. Thank you Rida Stephens
customer_reviews.author: rida l. stephens

customer_reviews.title: Starts off okay and then just gets harder
customer_reviews.text: As you will see in several of the 1-star reviews, this pillow does not hold up in the sense that it gets harder (or more stiff) the longer you use it. Sadly that has been my experience with this pillow too. I actually liked it at first, but now it is so hard that it has become uncomfortable to use. I even noticed that the pillow case is starting to fray along the stitching seams after a recent hand washing.
customer_reviews.author: Sentinus

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I'd been sleeping with an old cpap pillow (the cut out shape, but all polyfill) and a folded towel beneath that to try to get enough height for my shoulder. The very first night on this pillow (no towel beneath) was wonderful and it has remained excellent since. I use all the inserts but I have wide shoulders. It is also comfortable when sleeping on my back. Fantastic, wish I'd had one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rall

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review. I typically don't submit reviews but I felt for the price of this product I should. I got this pillow because I was recently diagnosed with sleep apnea and I've always had neck and shoulder problems sleeping and couldn't get comfortable with my new CPAP machine. I've gone through so many pillows and was excited when I saw some of the reviews of this one. Needless to say, almost a month later I'm disappointed. It says to give it about 5 days to soften up. It hasn't softened up. I'm still waking up in pain and it doesn't do anything different for my cpap machine. For the price I was expecting better comfort.
customer_reviews.author: RicanPecan82

customer_reviews.title: Not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly expected more for the price. It’s medium softness. Not really that comfortable for me. Maybe it’s personal preferences that are affecting my perception, but I wear a full face mask and I do better with a regular pillow or even a travel pillow. It didn’t help me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Hoogland

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good pillow, but the smell is off-putting
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillow overall, the firmness is great and it makes sleeping with my cpap mask much more comfortable. But I've had the pillow for over a week now, and despite washing the cover twice, the pillow still has a strong, chemical smell to it that's really unpleasant. When I have my mask on it's not as noticeable, but if I take off the mask and lay on the pillow for more than a couple of minutes it gives me a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this pillow
customer_reviews.text: It just didn’t work for my husband. I wish I could return it but I threw out the box. Not comfortable, and he tried for a week to get use to it. We removed the optional layers of foam. The indents first the hose was just not at all useful. Wasted $55.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Has a Chemical Smell
customer_reviews.text: Took this out of the box, put a case on it and went to bed. I woke up in the middle of the night to an awful chemical smell and with migrane type headache. I realized it was this pillow. The next day it sprayed it with Lysol. Didn't help. Then I ran it threw the "sanitize" cycle of my steam dryer.........didn't help. Then I soaked it with Lysol and let dry for 24hrs........NOPE, still smells like chemicals. So today it went in the trash. BYE BYE $$$$$
customer_reviews.author: Scott Morris

customer_reviews.title: Must have for CPAP users!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! My experience with my CPAP mask was greatly improved with this pillow. It feels like its great quality and the design is perfect. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Soft on one side and firm on the other with a nice tether strap for my tubing.
customer_reviews.author: peggy ann

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good night's sleep!
customer_reviews.text: Such a comfortable night's sleep finally! This pillow allows the full-face mask to not press on the pillow with a length of fabric to hold the hose out of your face,too . Easy to remove the special pillow case that buttons around the hose. I recommend you buy the pillow case, too....a regular pillow case doesn't let the hose move freely.
customer_reviews.author: Susan RN

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow
customer_reviews.text: It is a little thick, which makes getting used to it a little tough. I took the middle layer out for a few nights, then put it back in. This pillow has been a GREAT improvement in combating mask leakage. I would like it softer, but then it probably would not hold its shape as well.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: No more mask leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I have used a sleep machine for at least 10 years. Every night was a struggle to get my pillow adjusted so I wouldn’t have mask leaks. I bought this pillow in June to use at home and liked it so much, I bought another one a couple of weeks ago for our house in Florida. It works exactly as advertised. I sleep through the night every night because my pillow is so comfortable. I love the fact that it is adjustable. I simply had to remove one layer to adjust it for my comfort. I also like the fact that mask leaks are a thing of the past. I highly recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: CPAP mask seal saver
customer_reviews.text: I can finally sleep with my CPAP machine thanks to this pillow. When I roll to my side, the cutouts work well to keep my mask in place. The hose tether is a great addition to help keep the hose from acting like a slithering snake. I also like that height is adjustable due to the 3 foam sections. Great choice to make it 2 sided- foam or fiberfill. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Moozikl1

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a hard time finding a good pillow. I’m a side sleeper. It worked ok in the beginning but I no longer use it for my head.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Bad in every sense
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the outer case to remove one of the inside layers, they tore as I tried to peel them apart so I could try sleeping with fewer layers as the instructions noted. After a couple weeks of using the pillow, having tried the different combinations of inner layers, my neck was so tight and painful that it prohibited me from doing regular daily activities. Due to Covid-19, I didn't open the delivered package right away, and then it took several weeks for the neck problem to manifest and become so bad that I can no longer return it. I so wish I could.
customer_reviews.author: NWP

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I was sleeping with the pillow for over a week and a half now.. and are we getting 100% night sleep on my CPAP. I recommend it to anybody that's going to CPAP machine. It's good and comfortable sleeping on my back and my side. Heaven does the tube holder on the pillow is great I don't have to worry about the the tube getting caught up on the bed post or anything else. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: GARY

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the outrageous price
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to like this at first but the cool side is too hard for me and rough and the softer side has bunched all up within a week of using it.
customer_reviews.author: DMG2017

customer_reviews.title: Firm
customer_reviews.text: This is a very firm pillow. That being said, for a side sleeper, it does keep your head at a comfortable elevation, your head doesn’t sink into it. It also works well with a cpap mask.
customer_reviews.author: Habnar

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: looks like it would work, but it doesn't work for sleeping on my side using a cpap nasal mask
customer_reviews.author: HSV golfer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother who has ALS and was started on an assisted breathing machine at night. With this pillow she is able to rest more comfortably because the mask is not pushing up on her face. She is petite so making the pillow height adjustable was a wonderful selling point.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Kunz

customer_reviews.title: Really helps him sleep on side better. Wish it came with pillow case for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he loves it. Really helps him sleep on side better. Wish it came with pillow case for the price though. Would definitely buy again. He's used it for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size is so small. its size is best suited for a toddler what where they thinking its awful
customer_reviews.text: Got the pillow yesterday and its so small i can even move a little bit and the pillow moves out form under me and i am a small adult. the cutouts are a good thought but if you move just a inch your off the pillow already and the cutouts become useless. make and adult size pillow as most people with sleep apnea who use the resmed sleep apnea machine and face mask are older adults. the model should be labeled for toddlers and small size children. than make a pillow for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: The pillow corresponds to its description
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillow : it is well made with the 3 different layers that you can choose). But till now I'm not used to sleep with my CPAP device (mask) nor with my CPAPMax 2.0 Pillow. I used to sleep without a mask and without a pillow ! I hope I will get used to sleep with my CPAP and with my CPAPMax 2.0 Pillow cause till now, I only sleep 4-5 hours a night !
customer_reviews.author: THIERRY

customer_reviews.title: CPAP side sleeper must
customer_reviews.text: If you are a side sleeper this product is a must This is a quality product made very well !
customer_reviews.author: J. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Be a sleeper on your side and stationary.
customer_reviews.text: It is way smaller than conventional pillow. New to Bipap, lots of tossing around and the pillow is designed for more of a stationary sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Roth

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow I Found in 8 years!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Great pillow! I would have given it 5 stars, but I wish I could get a pillow case in a darker color, and I can't find replacement pillow casess so I can wash one and sleep with the other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So versatile! So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. Not only does it give you two types of pillow but I easily can change how much pillow I have under my head depending if I am trying to sleep or if I want to play with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is adjustable. I like my pillow a little less thick. I love that it holds my hose securely in place. I don't find that the cool side really is cooler, though.
customer_reviews.author: sandyfred

customer_reviews.title: If you get facial pressure from mask this will help.
customer_reviews.text: I am a cpap user and I like the cut outs that allow the mask sit freely on my face. The tether is able to keep the tubing close at hand and not pull the mask. It is flatter than I thought but sleeps well.
customer_reviews.author: Kmscna

customer_reviews.title: Finally a successful night sleep!
customer_reviews.text: The pillow was a definite solution to my tossing and turning from side to side only to have my cpap leak air from the pressure of pushing it away from my face. The pillow resolved that problem along with the cool gel that supports my head while on my back. I no longer get the sensation of my shoulders up-to-my-ears. My neck stiffness went away by the third night. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep support with CPAP
customer_reviews.text: Before this pillow I could never get comfortable with my CPAP on. Mainly because I am a side sleeper and it would always cause the CPAP to leak. This pillow prevents that and also is extremely comfortable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Parker

customer_reviews.title: Works well, new-foam smell not a problem
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I removed one of the three inner layers (the memory foam) to get the thickness I like. New-foam smell dissipates after a couple of days, and anyway, if you're using the CPAP then your air isn't coming from that close to the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Woolf,C

customer_reviews.title: Not right for me
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is very firm and cooling affect is over stated. The cut-out for your mask is in the wrong place for me. I would have done better with a corner cut-out. I used a few nights and abandoned it. May try again some time.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sleep aid.
customer_reviews.text: I slept longer and deeper Than in recent memory. It made my CPAP experience so much better. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Geigerich

customer_reviews.title: Fit it for your needs
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is adjustable to your needs..you can take out layers and adjust the height for your neck comfort. This is the second time I made this purchase. I love this pillow which is so comfortable yet firm. I take it with me on overnight stays elsewhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Di

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how I feel about it.
customer_reviews.text: Its not as comfortable as I thought. Great design thought but maybe I am just not use to how it is supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: CPAP Max 2.0 pillow
customer_reviews.text: My husband is sleeping better than ever with this pillow. The tether is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product helps my husband to sleep better with hi BiPAP machine. It is as listed...perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cpap users
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Cpap pillow I've purchased. They are perfect for the placement of your neck and head.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pillow for a week and love it. I has a nose mask and alternate from my back to side. It does take a couple days to break in but after that it has just the right amount of softness. I also like that it lifts my neck up and I don't have the neck pain I was getting with other pillows. I have not had any leakage problems. 5 stars from me
customer_reviews.author: JILL Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Neat idea at first....
customer_reviews.text: Cool pillow at first but after awhile it really doesn't make a difference if you use this or a regular pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Esther G

customer_reviews.title: Innovative Design Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: Eliminates the pillow pushing against the mask and causing leaks. Wonderful warrenty policy.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has changed everything! I’m a side sleeper and this pillow took all the pressure off my shoulders so I don’t flip to my other side because of shoulder pain. No break in period for me! It was perfect right out of the box! Don’t waste your time or $$ on anything else! If you are a big guy like me, this pillow was made for us! Thank you Contour! Best pillow made period.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: worked well with Cpap equipment
customer_reviews.text: This pillow did work well with cpap equipment, less tangle of hose. A bit pricey for a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gossard

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband said he slept really soundly the first night he used it and he doesn't normally. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Holguin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He uses a CPAP machine and loves to sleep on his side but won't with his CPAP. Used a week now and he loves it. Says it's comfortable and he can use the machine better than with a regular pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Baker

customer_reviews.title: Comfort level changes
customer_reviews.text: The ability to change the 3 inserts was a good idea. I ended up with 2 inserts for my comfort. The strap was of no use to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out on this product
customer_reviews.text: Took out the middle section amd still makes my neck sore
customer_reviews.author: Kam Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, does what it's advertised to do, arrived on time, no complaints - we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Wood Jr.

customer_reviews.title: There are many nights I sleep with my regular pillow instead of this one because it does not make that much of a difference and I actually like my regular pillow better
customer_reviews.text: I thought this pillow was extremely expensive for what you get. It is only "okay". There are many nights I sleep with my regular pillow instead of this one because it does not make that much of a difference and I actually like my regular pillow better.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Fonda

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is very hard.
customer_reviews.text: The sellers were great and the product showed up on time and was as pictured. However, I wasn't prepared for how hard the pillow was. There is nothing comfortable about it and it had no give to it at all. It does fit the cpap hose which is great but after several nights I gave up using it.
customer_reviews.author: R.P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Cpap pillow
customer_reviews.text: Far superior to the other Cpap pillow I tried. The ability to customize the pillow for personal best comfort is a real plus. The tether cord is a good idea too. A winner!
customer_reviews.author: L. Sally

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Helps me relax. I get a better sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan horton

customer_reviews.title: I can sleep on my side again!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for side sleeping CPAP users! No issues with mask being pushed out of place. Also, it's nice that you can adjust height because the layers aren't attached together.
customer_reviews.author: tgp

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. I was desperate for relief with my new cpap machine. This was not at all of any help.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: too hard on one side and the cord to hold hose not helpful
customer_reviews.author: jerri

customer_reviews.title: Product for me was as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I was very paranoid thinking a pillow would help me sleep with my Cpap. However I soon found this to be comfortable, helps my sleep pattern. I have now ordered a pillowcase for it.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Earned 50 Girlfriend Points
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend says this is definitely better than having a regular pillow. Earned 50 girlfriend points, thanks CPAPMax 2.0!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gerrish

customer_reviews.title: CPAP Trial
customer_reviews.text: For my hubby, the pillow was just too hard. I am sure that it is just right for many, just not him. So, we had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Deb

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Didn't take too long to adjust to this pillow. I like that you can remove a layer to adjust to your needs. You really will need the pillow case, sold seperately, to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A. Tab

customer_reviews.title: its a great pillow to have
customer_reviews.text: I really like it it takes a few days to get used to it and it helps me alot better now I have this pillow. Its a great product, I dont wake up tired, no headaches, no body pain which is so wonderful
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Pillow is great air tube holder is useless.
customer_reviews.text: the pillow is great but the section to hold the air tube is worthless it’s just a velcro attached to pillow and it really is useless beside that I love the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Layra

customer_reviews.title: Not a headline
customer_reviews.text: I am sorry to say the pillow did not work for me. I have a short neck an couldn't get comfortable. I returned the pillow but have not received any acknowledgement of the return. could you help me with that?
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Thoren

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is great for the neck as well as the cpap hoses
customer_reviews.text: Not only frixed my hose issues, but puts my neck at a better angle and improved my back and neck pain issues. fixed two problems when i was looking for only one.
customer_reviews.author: John Blakemore

customer_reviews.title: Great for CPAP users!
customer_reviews.text: My husband sleeps with a CPAP and struggles with pillows. Gave this to him as an early Christmas gift and he can finally sleep through the night with a tight seal on the mask. Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: kage6626

customer_reviews.title: Its ok but not that great
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for what it is. Not supportive seems too soft. Not anthing special for what it costs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I have purchased. The first one did not wear out. After a couple of years I wanted a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald B Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Helped alot with sleeping on my stomach, just wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Very pricey and does not work if you wear a full mask.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for the full mask that I have to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: To quote a competitor from TV, "This is MY pillow!"
customer_reviews.text: This is the pillow I've been looking for! Love how it is customizeable with the different layers, the depression for the head, and even different sleep surfaces on either side.
customer_reviews.author: VoraciousReaderBT

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Everyone who uses a CPAP machine should have one of these. The cutouts accommodate the CPAP mask.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Pillow does what it is designed for, cpap mask placement and neck and head support.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked this pillow, not the softest but I liked the support it gave my neck. Headaches are gone,my cpap stays in place on my face much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Woeks well for side sleepering with cpap mask on.
customer_reviews.text: Allows me to sleep on my side; couldn't really do that with a conventional pillow.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this and can sleep on her side with no mask issues.
customer_reviews.author: PipeFighter

customer_reviews.title: Dirty material?
customer_reviews.text: Item smelled of strong mildew. I washed layers separately in warm water with vinegar than mild laundry detergent. Hoping it was just from shelf storage, giving seller the benefit of the doubt. The blue pad started to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It really helps me  sleep better with using a c-pap
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended this contour c-pap pillow. I purchased through Amazon. Love it! I has improved my sleep comfort enormously. Very soft but firm enough. Doesn't interfere with my mask. I get more quality sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing much
customer_reviews.text: I found the pillow ok, but not better than a soft regular pillow. Also I had to buy a pillowcase separately, which I did not appreciate! I will see if Amazon will take this back.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: It does not let the mask dislodge
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent pillow for us with CPACs I sleep better
customer_reviews.author: George B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this product. It is the hardest pillow I've ever slept on. I have chronic neck pain. The cut out for the CPAP mask was fine. Really disappointed in this product.,
customer_reviews.author: DPeach

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is sofe and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way you can remove up to two layers of foam to fit your comfort level. I took out two layers which is at a height level I have always preferred.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is great. Wasn’t sure at first but by the third night I loved it. I’m small built. Long skinny neck. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: fun

customer_reviews.title: A pillow to fit me!
customer_reviews.text: i love my new contour pillow! it’s just perfect to use with my cpap, and it’s adjustable to fit me!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morrison

customer_reviews.title: too small and does not fit that well for a ...
customer_reviews.text: too small and does not fit that well for a large person
customer_reviews.author: Maria Miller

customer_reviews.title: No more air leaks at night
customer_reviews.text: My husband has a full mask cpap. He loves this pillow. No more leaking mask at night.
customer_reviews.author: Gayl A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for CPAP users
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and concept, unfortunately it didn't work for me due to neck issues.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Can Take It or leave it
customer_reviews.text: It's been a couple of weeks now. Still opting for regular pillow mostly. Will continue to use and more.
customer_reviews.author: Lennita

customer_reviews.title: Sleep better with this pillow design.
customer_reviews.text: I like a firm pillow with a bit of softness to it. So this was perfect. And I like the design (especially the indentation where the C-Pap hose is placed.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Pani

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, and comfortable, no wierd chemical smell,
customer_reviews.author: Holly R Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very firm
customer_reviews.text: Found the pillow to be hard as a rock , I tried the different arrangements but with no success.
customer_reviews.author: kathy seitz

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Has helped me adjust to wearing my CPAP mask and get sleep. Easy to travel with as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Customizable.
customer_reviews.text: The adjustability of the height was particularly nice. Also liked the choice of the two sides (soft or breathable).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Contour Products, CPAPMax 2.0 Pillow for Sleeping with CPAP Machine, Works for Side, Back and Stomach Sleepers, alleviates Leaking, Reduces Noise, no Odors
feature_bullets: MINIMIZE MASK LEAKS WITH PRESSURE FREE SIDE CUTOUTS – Reduce mask interference and help prevent your mask from shifting and moving throughout the night, allowing you to sleep in comfort with any type of mask.

CHOOSE FROM 2 DIFFERENT SLEEPING SURFACES – Ventilated foam promotes air circulation, providing a cooler night’s sleep with the 3D Mesh Memory Foam side, or if you prefer a traditional pillow surface, simply flip your pillow over for plush support with our soft, hypoallergenic, fiber filled side.

ULTIMATE ADJUSTABLE CPAP COMFORT – Three layer construction means this CPAP bed pillow provides users with optimal support & positioning benefits. The top layer memory foam portion cradles the contours of your face, a high resiliency middle layer provides added support for your neck and shoulders and the charcoal infused bottom layer neutralizes odors for freshness. These layers allow you to adjust your pillows height making it perfect for side, back and stomach sleepers.

ORTHOPEDIC CPAP PILLOW DESIGN FOR BETTER SUPPORT & COMFORT- This CPAP Pillow features a concave center portion to rest your head, a crescent cutout for your shoulders and facial support on the sides for easy breathing and improved positioning to maintain positive and continual airflow throughout the night.

BUY WITH COMPLETE CONFIDENCE – The Contour Products CPAPMax Pillow 2.0 is designed for comfort but developed for durability. Our CPAP pillow is constructed from high quality, premium support & memory foams that retains its shape for years after repeated, daily use.
